description: Master MCP Server - The ultimate MCP orchestrator that creates, manages, and controls other MCP servers. Features include automatic code generation, server lifecycle management, VS Code configuration updates, and comprehensive monitoring capabilities.
name: io.mastermcp.MasterMcpServer

environment_variables.name: MASTER_MCP_LOG_LEVEL
environment_variables.description: Logging level for Master MCP Server (Trace, Debug, Information, Warning, Error, Critical)

environment_variables.name: MASTER_MCP_SERVER_PATH
environment_variables.description: Base path where new MCP servers will be created. Defaults to ~/Documents

environment_variables.name: MASTER_MCP_AUTO_START
environment_variables.description: Automatically start servers after creation (true/false). Default: false
